content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed shell commands to export the PYTHONPATH and check its value, using "export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/arcgis" and "echo $PYTHONPATH". Both returned empty stdout and stderr. I then received various AI responses and executed actions, including appending text to a file, Googling for river restoration techniques and lake creation, browsing websites, getting text summaries, writing to files, and executing Python code to draw a river.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
